Posts.Content: You too inspire all on this site. Thank you so much for sharing your journey and knowledge. I wish you the best for the future.
Posts.Title: Graduation Day Clinical Trial

Posts.Content: I too am so sorry for your experience. I had a port placed many years ago without ANY pain. You need to get as far away from that doctor as possible! Seek someone other than him for follow ups. Report the incident to everyone that will listen to avoid this from happening to anyone one else. Sounds like someone forgot to administer the sedation and pain meds. Legal assistance may be warranted now. You are dealing with so much right now. All doctors are not like him. Try to breathe and rest to allow for healing. You are in my thoughts and prayers....
Posts.Title: Has anyone been denied anasthesia when having a port placed?

Posts.Content: You should have a state medical board you can file a complaint with. His medical liscense should be removed. You are strong and have the support of all here. Hang in there....
Posts.Title: Has anyone been denied anasthesia when having a port placed?

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for your loss. May your memories lessen the pain. I will hold you in my prayers.
